Taylor McFerrin (amụrụ na June 28, 1981 na San Francisco, California) bụ ónyé American DJ, ónyé na-emepụta égwu, onye na'egwú keyboard & beatboxer nke bi na Brooklyn, New York City, United States. Ọ bụ nwa mbụ nke ónyé na-agụ egwú na onye na-eduzi egwú Bobby McFerrin.

McFerrin wepụtara abọm mbụ ya Early Riser (2014) na Flying Lotus 'Brainfeeder Records. Abọm ahụ gosipụtara ndị ọbịa si Nai Palm (Hiatus Kaiyote), Thundercat, Robert Glasper, Cesar Mariano, Marcus Gilmore na Bobby McFerrin.
Ọrụ egwu ọhụrụ nkè Taylor na-ahụ ya dị ka akụkụ nke Robert Glasper's new jazz fusion supergroup, "R + R = Ugbu a", n'akụkụ Christian Scott, Terrace Martin, Derrick Hodge na Justin Tyson
Ndị otu ahụ wepụtara otu abọm, Collagically Speaking site na Blue Note Records na June 2018.
